body:
I was going to complain that doing this filtering processes destroys the correspondence between `module.state_dict()` and ONNX parameters, but apparently we already lost this property when @apaszke did e6cbe84bf679111316590efb4fd31ba195867a57. @apaszke, was destroying this correspondence intentional?

I will admit we have not been advertising the correspondence between `state_dict` and ONNX parameters, but if we don't have names for input parameters I am not sure how you are going to be able to line them up at all when they don't match.

body_text:
I was going to complain that doing this filtering processes destroys the correspondence between module.state_dict() and ONNX parameters, but apparently we already lost this property when @apaszke did e6cbe84. @apaszke, was destroying this correspondence intentional?
I will admit we have not been advertising the correspondence between state_dict and ONNX parameters, but if we don't have names for input parameters I am not sure how you are going to be able to line them up at all when they don't match.
